entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 4 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:23 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 08:23 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
